name: Debate Club
desc: A handy club made of fine steel. The most persuasive line of reasoning in any debater's arsenal.
skill_desc: After using an Elemental Skill, Normal or Charged Attacks, on hit, deal an additional 60%/75%/90%/105%/120% ATK DMG in a small area. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.
